title: Radiation Therapy Patient Education: Mobile Microlearning in Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of radiation therapy and medical terminology awareness
context.additional_context: Utilization of virtual environment (VERT/PEARL)-based educational content in a smartphone-centric restricted technology environment

learning_goals: They can simulate and explain the basic principles and treatment processes of radiation therapy in a virtual environment.
Acquire five key strategies for managing treatment side effects and daily life precautions through a mobile learning module
Design and implement patient-tailored educational scenarios using the VERT/PEARL system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
